tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
It's my first visit to the doctor.
I have shown the reports, and she suggested treatment with a costly tablet to begin with.
She asked me get more tests done and treatment accordingly.
She has advised what to eat and what not to eat.
The only difficulty was the practi maps didn't show location properly and I had to reach clinic and get directions which took about an hour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Booked an appointment with Dr.Sivani payneni for my diabetic review as one of my friend  suggested her.The waiting time there was less than 10 minutes,the staff at the clinic were very professional and helpful .The Dr calmly listened to my problems and gave me best suggestions .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shivani is very experienced and understanding. She understood my condition and helped me with it. Treatment was very effective. The place is very hygienic and staff Is cooperative and helpful. Would recommend  to everyone who is struggling with high sugar levels and complications.

tags: None
review:
The doctor is well experienced and is a subject matter expert ... she successfully was able to get my dads sugars under control with her medication combined with her diet plan. Dr. Sivani has been quite helpful in understanding the sugar levels when explained to her on a daily basis.

I would strongly recommend anyone suffering from Diabetes to consult her and experience the magic in her methods and her super hygienic clinic and very welcoming staff.

tags: None
review: Amazing experience. Doctor was all ears to the problem I had been facing and enquired every little detail about the issue and suggested various methods/ diet suggestions before actually giving any medicine. I think it's rare these days, when a doctor understands you and then suggests you. Im currently being treated for hypertension and I totally recommend her. The clinic is pretty new and well maintained.

tags: None
review:
My Father is an Diabetes&we met Dr Sivani Payneni. She is very polite and the doctor is very good natured which is hardly found these days & also very kind hearted, wonderful experience.
She explained important things related to diabeties and did all necessary tests.Her explanation was very clear.The hospital is very clean & hygiene.Team is very good and taking covid-19 precautions too....

I Recommend the Doctor.....!!!
